<answer>The file 'team-meeting-minutes.docx' contains minutes from a team meeting held on May 17, 2024. The attendees were Emma Johnson, David Lee, Linda Green, and Mark Roberts. 

The meeting covered:
1. Progress of the new project
2. Marketing strategies and upcoming campaigns
3. Sales projections and customer feedback

Action items assigned:
- David: Coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase by May 20, 2024.
- Linda: Email the 'meeting-agenda-2024-05-15.docx' file to john.mitchell@gmail.com for review by May 21, 2024.
- Mark: Review the sales projections and provide feedback by May 19, 2024.

The file was last modified on May 6, 2024, at 10:30:00. It is owned by emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com and shared with David Lee, Linda Green, and Mark Roberts, all of whom have read and write permissions.</answer>
